title: Projects
subtitle: This is the Project page, nice!

projects.name: Php Static Site Generator
projects.description: A static site generator written on php which uses laravel's blade template-engine. A static site generator is essentially a set of tools for building static websites based on a set of input files

projects.name: Team & Task Management
projects.description: It is a team and task management SPA. You can manage your tasks just like you can do in Trello but now with Teams

projects.name: Cancer Detection using ML (KNN & SVM)
projects.description: I've used KNN & SVM Algorithm. Accuracy of these algorithms are also compared. There is also good data visualization

projects.name: Identicon
projects.description: This application is written on Elixir, it generates identicon similar to github's default profile picture An Identicon is a visual representation of a hash value. Today Identicons are used in a broad spectrum of applications such as Githubâ€™s default avatars

projects.name: Corona Logger
projects.description: This application is written on Java Framework I used is spring boot. It shows the number of Corona affected people in different cities, pulls data from open source csv file hosted on github

projects.name: Recursive Web Crawler
projects.description: Recursive Web Crawler written on Php
